column4: I am running Ubuntu 7.10 AMD64 Desktop. I want to go for fresh installation of 8.04 . In my existing 7.10 , i have about 50GB of data in my home directory. I don't have any place to take the backup of that much of data. My question is, when i am installing 8.04, is there any option Ubuntu gives to preserve the /home directory ?
then best to upgrade via the net
